EmailTemplate.name: ES-2019-03-29 Multicloud Report eBlast #1.ES-2019-03-29 Multicloud Report eBlast
EmailTemplate.subject: Are you ready for a multicloud world?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Earlier this year, we surveyed over 800 IT professionals to better understand the dynamics fueling container and multicloud adoption. The results are in, and they clearly show that multicloud is on the rise and container adoption is accelerating. Download our report <[[https://turbonomic.com/state-of-multicloud?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRzBAAU]]>to learn more.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/state-of-multicloud?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRzBAAU]]>
Here are just a few of our takeaways from the survey results:
- Serverless computing remains in early stages - Cultural change and skills gap are among top IT challenges - AI/ML will elevate IT careers, fueling AIOps adoption across organizations
Download this report <[[https://turbonomic.com/state-of-multicloud?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRzBAAU]]> to learn more about the findings and what it takes to be ready for a multicloud world.
Regards, Andrew
